rukus.text: walaqad akhadhna ala fir'ʿawna bil-sinina wanaqsin mina l-thamarati laʿallahum yadhakkaruna
fa-idha jaathumu l-hasanatu qalu lana hadhihi wa-in tusib'hum sayyi-atun yattayyaru bimusa waman maʿahu ala innama tairuhum ʿinda l-lahi walakinna aktharahum la yaʿlamuna
waqalu mahma tatina bihi min ayatin litasharana biha fama nahnu laka bimu'minina
fa-arsalna ʿalayhimu l-tufana wal-jarada wal-qumala wal-dafadiʿa wal-dama ayatin mufassalatin fa-is'takbaru wakanu qawman muj'rimina
walamma waqaʿa ʿalayhimu l-rij'zu qalu yamusa ud'ʿu lana rabbaka bima ʿahida ʿindaka la-in kashafta ʿanna l-rij'za lanu'minanna laka walanur'silanna maʿaka bani is'raila
falamma kashafna ʿanhumu l-rij'za ila ajalin hum balighuhu idha hum yankuthuna
fa-intaqamna min'hum fa-aghraqnahum fi l-yami bi-annahum kadhabu biayatina wakanu ʿanha ghafilina

wa-awrathna l-qawma alladhina kanu yus'tadʿafuna mashariqa l-ardi wamagharibaha allati barakna fiha watammat kalimatu rabbika l-hus'na ʿala bani is'raila bima sabaru wadammarna ma kana yasnaʿu fir'ʿawnu waqawmuhu wama kanu yaʿrishuna
wajawazna bibani is'raila l-bahra fa-ataw ʿala qawmin yaʿkufuna ʿala asnamin lahum qalu yamusa ij'ʿal lana ilahan kama lahum alihatun qala innakum qawmun tajhaluna
inna haulai mutabbarun ma hum fihi wabatilun ma kanu yaʿmaluna
qala aghayra l-lahi abghikum ilahan wahuwa faddalakum ʿala l-ʿalamina
wa-idh anjaynakum min ali fir'ʿawna yasumunakum sua l-ʿadhabi yuqattiluna abnaakum wayastahyuna nisaakum wafi dhalikum balaon min rabbikum ʿazimun
